moves.name: Confusion
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target confused.

moves.name: Stand Together!
moves.effect: Raises the Defense and Speed of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.effect: Restores the user’s HP based on the amount of damage dealt to the target.

passives.name: Lithe
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting paralyzed.

passives.name: Natural Remedy
passives.description: Once per battle, removes all status conditions from the user when the user is inflicted by any status condition.

passives.name: Quick Cure
passives.description: Removes the confused, flinching, and trapped conditions from the user once during battle.
